message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500. Is that something you'd be interested in?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm!  $9,500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now.  How about we split the difference at $9,000?  I'm sure we can find common ground.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was really hoping to get closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,000 and $9,500, so I'm going to offer it to you for $9,250. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
